name: Koshex
headline: Automating wealth creation for 400M Indian millennials
description: Koshex is building Wealthfront for India with data-driven insights around day to day finances for an individual to save more and invest well. We are automating wealth creation for 400 million Indian millennials with access to more than US$700bn of individual investable wealth.

founders.name: Akash Agrawal, Founder
founders.description: Ola, Capital Float, Rothschild & UBS Investment Bank

founders.name: Komal Kumar Gupta, Founder
founders.description: Interest: Mathematics, Binary, Data, Non-Fictions & Philosophy.

generated_description:
Koshex is a fintech startup based in Bengaluru, India, that aims to transform the way Indian millennials manage their money. Founded as part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Koshex’s mission is straightforward: automate wealth creation for the 400 million Indian millennials who hold over $700 billion in investable assets. The company started with a vision akin to building Wealthfront for India, employing data-driven insights to help individuals save and invest more effectively.

Coshed operates a team of 21 passionate individuals. Their offerings focus on making investing accessible and hassle-free, with features like:

- **Mutual Funds:** Access to over 5,000 funds, allowing individuals to start investing with as little as ₹100.
- **Smart Deposits:** A superior alternative to traditional saving accounts.
- **Digital Gold:** Enabling users to buy, sell, and accumulate 24K gold with 99.99% purity.
- **Fixed Deposits:** Offering better interest rates than conventional banks.

Emphasizing the importance of early investing, Koshex encourages users to track their net worth in real-time and manage their finances through various budgeting tools. The app aims to provide a seamless experience where users can consolidate all their investments and monitor their savings and spending habits—all under a single dashboard.

What's particularly appealing about Koshex is its user-centric approach. Their solutions are tailored to align with individual financial goals, which users have positively noted in testimonials highlighting Koshex’s effectiveness in managing their finances, both online and offline.

On the security front, Koshex prioritizes user data, employing military-grade encryption protocols to ensure that only users can access their information, bolstering trust in an era where data privacy is paramount.

The company is recognized not only by Y Combinator but also takes pride in its partnerships with prominent investment solutions, aiming to elevate the financial well-being of its community of over 100,000 users.

For those curious to learn more, their website (https://www.koshex.com) provides a wealth of information on services and how to start your financial journey with Koshex. As millennials increasingly seek to take control of their financial futures, Koshex stands as an innovative partner in automating wealth creation and fostering smarter financial habits within the digital landscape.
